content.text:
[@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) Yeah, I just ran `npm i -g scuttlebot@13.0.3` and it worked great:

```console
$ npm i -g scuttlebot@13.0.3                          master
npm WARN deprecated nomnom@1.6.2: Package no longer supported. Contact support@npmjs.com for more info.
/home/christianbundy/.node_modules/bin/sbot -> /home/christianbundy/.node_modules/lib/node_modules/scuttlebot/bin.js
/home/christianbundy/.node_modules/bin/scuttlebot -> /home/christianbundy/.node_modules/lib/node_modules/scuttlebot/bin.js
npm WARN optional SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: fsevents@1.2.4 (node_modules/scuttlebot/node_modules/fsevents):
npm WARN notsup SKIPPING OPTIONAL DEPENDENCY: Unsupported platform for fsevents@1.2.4: wanted {"os":"darwin","arch":"any"} (current: {"os":"linux","arch":"x64"})

+ scuttlebot@13.0.3
added 3 packages from 2 contributors, removed 12 packages and updated 10 packages in 19.596s
```
